nodes.text: Sliteye's Entertainment Emporium was a bar located on the outskirts of the Ord Mynock Freeport. It had a glitzy and gaudy facade, but the interior was designed to cater to workers and miners. The Emporium was owned by Zelto Sliteye, and he allowed criminals to use the location as a base of operations. Vasteg the Devaronian forger and Jnoofot the Aqualish mercenary ran their operations out of the Emporium.
